Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I’m far more pressured to say I understand the content when I’m in front of a teacher than with GenAI, even if I done truly grasp the concept.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Generative AI feels as if it doesn’t understand the curriculum or assignment well at all, no matter how detailed the prompt.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is more likely to be more harsh and give through feedback.
